subject: Football
Rhodes Scholarship
lead_paragraph: Myron Rolle, a safety from Florida State who will likely be a top pick in next year’s N.F.L. draft, put football on hold to attend Oxford as a Rhodes scholar.
snippet: Myron Rolle, a safety from Florida State who will likely be a top pick in next year’s N.F.L. draft, put football on hold to attend Oxford as a Rhodes scholar.
